ValueEntry.Name: Medium Storage Hopper
ValueEntry.Description: Stores 25 Items.\nAuto transfers.\nUse E to alter transfer type.

ValueEntry.Name: Small Storage Hopper
ValueEntry.Description: Stores 10 Items.\nAuto transfers.\nUse E to alter transfer type.

ValueEntry.Name: Void Hopper
ValueEntry.Description: Deletes Items!\nAuto transfers.\nUse E to alter transfer type.

ValueEntry.Name: Huge Storage Hopper
ValueEntry.Description: Stores 200 Items.\nAuto transfers.\nUse E to alter transfer type

ValueEntry.Name: Nano Storage Hopper
ValueEntry.Description: Stores 1 Items.\nAuto transfers.\nUse E to alter transfer type

ValueEntry.Name: 75 Slot Storage Hopper
ValueEntry.Description: Stores 75 Items.\nAuto transfers.\nUse E to alter transfer type

ValueEntry.Name: Half Storage Hopper
ValueEntry.Description: Stores 50 Items.\nAuto transfers.\nUse E to alter transfer type

ValueEntry.Name: 125 Slot Storage Hopper
ValueEntry.Description: Stores 125 Items.\nAuto transfers.\nUse E to alter transfer type

ValueEntry.Name: 150 Slot Storage Hopper
ValueEntry.Description: Stores 150 Items.\nAuto transfers.\nUse E to alter transfer type

ValueEntry.Name: 2000 Slot One Type Storage Hopper
ValueEntry.Description: Stores 2000 Items of the same type.\nAuto transfers.\nUse E to alter transfer type

ValueEntry.Description: Stores 1000 Items of the same type.\nAuto transfers.\nUse E to alter transfer type
